item.title: Part 1 - Managing Network Rules by using Azure Tags with Illumio for Microsoft Azure Firewall
item.description:
Written in collaboration between @andrewmathu and @gusmodena
Introduction
In today's ever-evolving realm of the present IT infrastructure, where virtualization and cloud computing have become standard practices, the orchestration of firewall rules has evolved into a delicate balancing act between security and adaptability. Traditionally, firewall rules have relied heavily on the use of IP addresses to control access, which, while effective, often proves to be a complex and labor-intensive approach.
